description:
Play Draw Something, the most popular social drawing and guessing game in the App Store with over 7 billion drawings created! Experience for yourself the laugh-out-loud game your friends are raving about and FREE from third-party Ads!
- 3500+ Words to Draw 
- 200 FREE Coins
- 5 FREE Bombs 
_________________________________
Not ready to buy? Download the FREE version - Draw Something Free
If you already have the free version, switching to the paid version is easy! Your existing account, games, and friends will carry over automatically to this ad-free version.
PLEASE NOTE: If you are having trouble finding your Draw Something password, please check the welcome email you received when you signed up.
_____________________________________
PRAISE FOR DRAW SOMETHING 
"It's unintentionally hilarious" - Mashable 
"Very unique" and "Incredibly addictive" - Kotaku 
"Utterly amazing. No, really. I'm not exaggerating" - 148 Apps 
_________________________________

FEATURES:
-Play with Your Friends on iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch!
Challenge friends on Facebook or Twitter, or be automatically partnered with new gaming buddies.
-No Drawing Skills Required!
Stick figures and a sense of humor are welcome! Just wiggle you finger to create a doodle masterpiece!
-Color Craze - Over 50 Vibrant Colors!
Turn simple doodles into rich masterpieces with color packs.
-Turn-based Gameplay
Perfect for gamers-on-the-go! Take turns drawing and guessing at your own pace.
- Guess Something
Take the weekly challenge & guess drawings of players from around the world. Complete challenges and earn bombs.
- Leaderboard 
Compete with your friends & check whose guessing skills are better.
-Bombs
Stumped by a difficult word? Use bombs to make it easier to guess.
-Push Notifications
Be alerted when it’s your turn to draw or guess.

Become a fan! Get exclusive rewards and stay up to date on our latest news.
Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playdrawsomething

Use of this application is governed by the Zynga Terms of Service. Collection and use of personal data are subject to Zynga's Privacy Policy. Both policies are available in the Application License Agreement below as well as at www.zynga.com. Social Networking Service terms may also apply.
releaseNotes: This update addresses a critical fix for the interstitial ads that is displayed after every turn played by an user. Currently the ‘close’ button on interstitial ads is sometimes non-responsive as it appears very close to the signal bar. This prevents players from  navigating to the next screen and affects the game actions and our ratings. This build contain necessary fixes to ensure that user can close ads without any hassles.  This build also has fixes for the top 3 crashes(close to 80% of crashes) being faced by our players currently.
